TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CancellationTokenSource extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 向应该被取消的 发送信号。

span.span: Signals to a that it should be canceled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，.NET Framework 涉及两个对象的协作取消异步操作或长时间运行的同步操作使用一个统一的模型：Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the .NET Framework uses a unified model for cooperative cancellation of asynchronous or long-running synchronous operations that involves two objects: - A对象，它提供取消标记通过其属性和发送一个取消消息通过调用其或方法。A object, which provides a cancellation token through its property and sends a cancellation message by calling its or method. - A对象，该值指示是否已请求取消操作。A object, which indicates whether cancellation is requested. 用于实现协作取消模型的常规模式是：The general pattern for implementing the cooperative cancellation model is: - 实例化 对象，此对象管理取消通知并将其发送给单个取消标记。Instantiate a object, which manages and sends cancellation notification to the individual cancellation tokens. - 将 属性返回的标记传递给每个侦听取消的任务或线程。Pass the token returned by the property to each task or thread that listens for cancellation. - 调用从接收到取消标记的操作的方法。Call the method from operations that receive the cancellation token. 提供有关每个任务或线程以响应取消请求的机制。Provide a mechanism for each task or thread to respond to a cancellation request. 无论你选择取消某一操作，和完全如何你执行此操作，取决于你的应用程序逻辑。Whether you choose to cancel an operation, and exactly how you do it, depends on your application logic. - 调用 方法以提供取消通知。Call the method to provide notification of cancellation. 这将设置取消标记每个副本上的属性`true`。This sets the property on every copy of the cancellation token to `true`. - 调用方法在你完成对象。Call the method when you are finished with the object. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管线程中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在完成使用类型的实例后，您应释放它的中，直接或间接。When you have finished using an instance of the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的随机数生成器来模拟的数据集合应用程序从十一种不同检测读取 10 的整数值。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 零值指示度量值已失败的一个检测，应计算在这种情况下应取消操作和任何总体平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要处理可能取消操作，该示例实例化对象，它生成的取消标记传递给的对象。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象反过来取消将标记传递到每个任务负责收集特定检测读数。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法来确保只有在所有读数已都收集了成功后，才计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果某个任务具有不是它已被取消，因为调用方法引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可同时使用多个线程从除外，后者仅必须时要使用所有其他操作对象已完成。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must only be used when all other operations on the object have completed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that will be canceled after the specified delay in milliseconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 倒计时`millisecondsDelay`在构造函数的调用期间启动。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during the call to the constructor. 当`millisecondsDelay`过期，构造（如果它未取消已） 取消。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, the constructed is canceled (if it has not been canceled already). 后续调用将重置`millisecondsDelay`用于构建，如果未已取消。Subsequent calls to will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that will be canceled after the specified time span.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造函数的调用期间启动延迟倒计时。The countdown for the delay starts during the call to the constructor. 延迟到期时，构造已取消，如果未已取消。When the delay expires, the constructed is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 后续调用将重置构造的延迟，如果未已取消。Subsequent calls to will reset the delay for the constructed , if it has not been canceled already.

Communicates a request for cancellation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel() cil managed

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联将接收取消通知并将转换为状态其中，则返回 true。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns true. 任何回调或可取消操作注册将执行。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 我们建议可取消操作和回调注册与不会引发异常。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 取消的此重载将聚合到引发任何异常，以便一个回调引发异常不会阻止其他已注册的回调正在执行。This overload of Cancel will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用的随机数生成器来模拟的数据集合应用程序从十一种不同检测读取 10 的整数值。The following example uses a random number generator to emulate a data collection application that reads 10 integral values from eleven different instruments. 零值指示度量值已失败的一个检测，应计算在这种情况下应取消操作和任何总体平均值。A value of zero indicates that the measurement has failed for one instrument, in which case the operation should be cancelled and no overall mean should be computed. 若要处理可能取消操作，该示例实例化对象，它生成的取消标记传递给的对象。To handle the possible cancellation of the operation, the example instantiates a object that generates a cancellation token which is passed to a object. 对象反过来取消将标记传递到每个任务负责收集特定检测读数。The object in turn passes the cancellation token to each of the tasks responsible for collecting readings for a particular instrument. 调用方法来确保只有在所有读数已都收集了成功后，才计算平均值。The method is called to ensure that the mean is computed only after all readings have been gathered successfully. 如果某个任务具有不是它已被取消，因为调用方法引发异常。If a task has not because it has been cancelled, the call to the method throws an exception. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/cs/cancel1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.CancellationTokenSource.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.cancellationtokensource.class/vb/cancel1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Cancel(bool throwOnFirstException) cil managed

param.name: throwOnFirstException
param.span: 如果异常应立即传播，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if exceptions should immediately propagate; otherwise, .

summary.span: 如果出现异常，传达取消请求，并指定是否应处理其余回调和可取消操作。

span.span: Communicates a request for cancellation, and specifies whether remaining callbacks and cancelable operations should be processed if an exception occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 关联将接收取消通知并将转换为状态其中返回`true`。The associated will be notified of the cancellation and will transition to a state where returns `true`. 任何回调或可取消操作注册将执行。Any callbacks or cancelable operations registered with the will be executed. 按后进先出顺序，将同步执行回调。Callbacks will be executed synchronously in LIFO order. 我们建议可取消操作和回调注册与不会引发异常。We recommend that cancelable operations and callbacks registered with not throw exceptions. 如果`throwOnFirstException`是`true`，异常将立即传播到调用，阻止其余回调和从正在处理的可取消操作。If `throwOnFirstException` is `true`, an exception will immediately propagate out of the call to , preventing the remaining callbacks and cancelable operations from being processed. 如果`throwOnFirstException`是`false`，此重载将聚合到引发任何异常，以便一个回调引发异常不会阻止其他已注册的回调正在执行。If `throwOnFirstException` is `false`, this overload will aggregate any exceptions thrown into an , such that one callback throwing an exception will not prevent other registered callbacks from being executed.

span.span: An aggregate exception containing all the exceptions thrown by the registered callbacks on the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 倒计时`millisecondsDelay`期间此调用启动。The countdown for the `millisecondsDelay` starts during this call. 当`millisecondsDelay`过期，这已取消，如果未已取消。When the `millisecondsDelay` expires, this is canceled, if it has not been canceled already. 对 CancelAfter 的后续调用将重置`millisecondsDelay`此，如果未已取消。Subsequent calls to CancelAfter will reset the `millisecondsDelay` for this , if it has not been canceled already.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsCancellationRequested As Boolean
public: property bool IsCancellationRequested { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取是否已请求取消此 。

span.span: Gets whether cancellation has been requested for this .

value.span: 如果已请求取消此 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if cancellation has been requested for this ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否已请求取消此令牌的源，例如由于调用其方法。This property indicates whether cancellation has been requested for this token source, such as due to a call to its method. 如果此属性返回`true`，它只保证已请求取消。If this property returns `true`, it only guarantees that cancellation has been requested. 它不保证通过相应的标记注册每个处理程序已完成执行，也不取消请求已完成传播到所有已注册处理程序。It does not guarantee that every handler registered with the corresponding token has finished executing, nor that cancellation requests have finished propagating to all registered handlers. 尤其是在正在其中同时取消相关的对象的情况下，可能需要其他同步。Additional synchronization may be required, particularly in situations where related objects are being canceled concurrently.
